title: despised icon
description:
Despised Icon is a deathcore band from Montreal, Quebec. The band was formed by members of Neuraxis, In Dying Days and Heaven&#039;s Cry, in January 2002.

The band is noted for the use of two vocalists, Alexandre Erian, who sings using a mid-range screaming technique (the "hardcore vocals"), and Steve Marois for the extremely low growls, high pitched screams, and exhaled pig squeals. Despised Icon is known for its work in the underground music industry, having been met with both critical acclaim and appraisal for its efforts in deathcore music.
